attributes.action: bring about legislation to compensate persons who took out endowment polices before april1988
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: before this date the finanial services authority did not exist and as a result of this insurance companies are able to reject legitimite claims for wrongly sold endowment policies.being told your policy would mature giving a value in my case £8000 to£10000 above my morgage then be told 18year later it wont evenbe enough to pay your final morgage bill,tens of thousands the public are in the same position as myself.companies are using the fact the (fsa)didnt exist to reject valid claims.i petition the goverment in power to legislate a law to help the persons effected by this thankyou.
